title: The appeal hearing
subtitle: Your appeal will be decided using the information you submit in this form and any additional evidence you send in. Information and evidence submitted by DWP will also be considered.
subtitleIba: The Tribunal will decide your appeal using the information you give in this appeal form and any further information you send. Information provided by (FTA) will also be considered.
explainReasons: If you come to the hearing you can explain your reasons for appealing.
arrangeSupport: Support can be arranged for you such as an interpreter, hearing loop or disabled access.

hearingFormatsList.title: Hearing formats
hearingFormatsList.subtitle: Your appeal could be decided:
hearingFormatsList.bulletPoint1: at a hearing you take part in – most hearings are held in person at a tribunal building but you can ask to have the hearing remotely by video or by phone
hearingFormatsList.bulletPoint2: as a 'paper hearing' – the tribunal looks at the documents and evidence and makes a decision without you taking part in a hearing

hearingSupportList.title: Hearing support
hearingSupportList.subtitle: If you take part in a hearing, you can ask for support, such as:
hearingSupportList.bulletPoint1: support can be arranged, such as an interpreter, hearing loop or disabled access. You can’t bring your own interpreter to the hearing

attendHearing.title: Do you want to attend the hearing?
attendHearing.titleIba: Which type of hearing would you prefer?
attendHearing.yesIba: I prefer a hearing that I take part either in person, by video or by phone
attendHearing.noIba: I prefer a ‘paper hearing’ where I do not take part, decided on documents and information provided

error.required: You need to say whether you want to attend the hearing. Select either yes or no
error.requiredIba: You need to say whether you want to take part in the hearing. Select either option
